Wisdom: مَنْ أَلَحَّ عَلَيْهِ الْفَقْرُ فَلْيُكْثِرْ مِنْ قَوْلِ لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ
enWisdom: One who is overcome by poverty should frequently recite: There is no might and no power but by [the will of] Allah, the Most High, the Most Mighty

Wisdom: الْغِنَى وَالْفَقْرُ يَكْشِفَانِ جَوَاهِرَ الرِّجَالِ وَأَوْصَافَهَا
enWisdom: Wealth and poverty manifest the essences of men and their qualities

Wisdom: الْفَقْرُ وَالْغِنَى بَعْدَ الْعَرْضِ عَلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: True poverty and wealth are [determined] after presenting [the account of] one’s deeds before Allah, the Glorified
Affluence through [complete reliance on] Allah is the greatest affluence

Wisdom: احْتَجْ إِلَى مَنْ شِئْتَ وَكُنْ أَسِيرَهُ
enWisdom: Express your needs to whomever you wish and (you will) become his captive
any a grant is such that misfortune is better than it
The wealth of a poor person is his contentment
The deprived may [also] be granted sustenance

Wisdom: لَنْ يَسْلَمَ مِنَ الْمَوْتِ فَقِيرٌ لِإِقْلَالِهِ
enWisdom: The poor person will never be saved from death because of his poverty

Wisdom: مَنْ سَلَا عَنِ الْمَسْلُوبِ كَأَنْ لَمْ يُسْلَبْ
enWisdom: One who forgets about what has been robbed from him, it is as if he has not been robbed

Wisdom: مَنْ رَضِيَ بِمَا قَسَمَ اللَّهُ لَهُ لَمْ يَحْزَنْ عَلَى مَا فِي يَدِ غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: One who is satisfied with what Allah has allotted for him does not become sad about what others possess

Wisdom: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ مَا أَصْبَحَ فِيهِ أَهْلُ الْغُرُورِ بِالدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّمَا هُوَ ظِلٌّ مَمْدُودٌ إِلَى أَجَلٍ مَحْدُودٍ
enWisdom: Never be deceived by the condition of the people of vanities [and what they enjoy of this world], for indeed it is an extended shadow [which lasts] until a fixed time

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ النَّاسَ أَنْ يَزْهَدَ فِيمَا فِي أَيْدِيهِمْ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows the [true nature of] people to be uninterested in that which they possess
